# topShelfStyle

**Instance Property**

The user interface style that should be used to display the content items.

## Declaration

```swift
var topShelfStyle: TVTopShelfContentStyle { get }
```

## Implementing TV Services Extension Properties

- **topShelfItems**: Returns an array of content items to be displayed.
- **TVTopShelfContentStyle**: An enumerated type used to specify the style in which you want your content to be displayed.
